Name: BindingToDynamicData
Description:
Binding To Dynamic Data
In this example you will find out how to use binding with RadMenu.

[//]:

Name: Customization_MVVM
Description:
Customization _ MVVM
Telerik Menu allows full customization of its items. In this example, thanks to the MVVM patterns and the custom style selectors, the submenu items represent rich content visualizing different view models.

[//]:

Name: OldMenuAndItemStyle
Description:
Q2 RadMenu Style
This example demonstrates how to customize the RadMenuItem and RadMenu Styles in order to make the RadMenu control look like it was before the Q3 2013 release of RadMenu. The custom Styles can be found in the App.xaml of the project.

In this example you will find out how to use scrolling for RadMenuItem.
